resource_data:
"<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>17043594-3a1c-4fe8-a39c-fb153a570bb5#1#7</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">Pálya, út, elmozdulás</string>
            <string language="en">orbit, line, moving, </string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bahn, Zeile, bewegend,</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">orbite, ligne, se déplaçant,</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">órbita, linha, movendo-se,</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">orbita, riga, muoventesi,</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">τροχιά, γραμμή, που κινείται,</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">órbita, línea, moviéndose,</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">Pálya, út, elmozdulás, út-idő grafikon</string>
            <string language="en">orbit, line, moving, line-time graph</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">mozgások leírása,  pálya,  út,  elmozdulás,  hely-idő grafikon,  </string>
            <string language="en">describe of movings,  orbit, line,  moving, position-time diagram,  </string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bahn, Zeile, bewegend, Zeile-Zeit Diagramm</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">orbite, ligne, se déplaçant, graphique de 
ligne-temps</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">órbita, linha, movendo-se, gráfico do 
linha-tempo</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">orbita, riga, muoventesi, grafico di riga-tempo</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">τροχιά, γραμμή, κίνηση, γραμμή-χρονική γραφική 
παράσταση</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">órbita, línea, moviéndose, gráfico del 
li'nea-tiempo</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">beschreiben Sie von den movings, Bahn, die Zeile und 
bewegen, Position-Zeit Diagramm,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">décrivez des movings, orbite, ligne, se déplaçant, 
diagramme de position-temps,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">descreva dos movings, órbita, linha, movendo-se, 
diagrama do posição-tempo,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">descriva dei movings, l'orbita, la riga, muoventesi, 
schema di posizione-tempo,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">περιγράψτε των κινήσεων, τροχιά, γραμμή, κίνηση, 
θέση-χρονικό διάγραμμα,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">describa de los movings, órbita, línea, moviéndose, 
diagrama del posicio'n-tiempo,</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <educational>

        <rights>

          </cost>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A tartalom kizárólag kizárólag az oktatás illetve tudományos kutatás céljára használható szigorúan non-profit jelleggel.</string>
            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
        <classification>
          <purpose>
            <source>purposeValues</source>
            <value>discipline</value>
          </purpose>
          <taxonPath>
            <source>
              <string language="x-none">LRE-0001</string>
            </source>
            <taxon>
              <id>978</id>
            </taxon>
          </taxonPath>
        </classification>
        <metaMetadata>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard
        org:Sulinet
        version:3.0
        end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
